decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

Location Plan (Ref: TQRQM21183152701129; dated 02/07/2021); 02 - Existing Front Elevation (dated 03/09/2021); 03 - Proposed Front Elevation (dated 06/09/2021); 04 - Existing Rear Elevation (dated 21/09/2021); 05 - Proposed Rear Elevation (dated 21/09/2021); Window Details (undated); Design and Access Statement (undated; as received 25/01/2022); DWG/01 (Revision 00; dated August 2021); DGW/02 (Revision 00; dated August 2021); Henry and Sons - Timber Brochure (undated; as received 25/01/2022); DWG/02/01 - Proposed Kitchen Window Section Drawings (Revision 00; dated Feb 2022); DWG/02/02 - Ground Floor Bay Window Section Drawings (Revision 00; dated Feb 2022); DWG/02/03 - Ground Floor Side - Kitchen Sash - Section Drawings (Revision 00; dated Feb 2022).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwelling, as per the submitted application form.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policy D4 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012.
description: Replacement of existing windows with double glazed timber windows; replacement of existing rear door with double glazed timber door
